contextMenuCopyLinks.description: Context menu item to copy links

noTextSelected.message: No text selected. Please select a portion of the page that contains links.
noTextSelected.description: Message when no text is selected

noLinksFound.description: Message when no links are found in selection

noValidLinksFound.message: No valid links found in selection.
noValidLinksFound.description: Message when no valid links are found in selection

extDescription.message: Quickly extract, open, or copy all links from your text selection. Supports both hyperlinked tags and plain-text URLs.

longDescription.message:
Link Wringer is the ultimate productivity tool for researchers, developers, and power users. Simply highlight a section of a webpage, right-click, and instantly manage all links within that selection.

Key Features:
- Open All Links: Launch every URL in the selection into new background tabs with one click.
- Copy to Clipboard: Extract all URLs and save them to your clipboard as a clean list.
- Plain Text Extraction: Advanced regex support finds URLs even if they aren't clickable links.
- Customizable: Toggle between strict and relaxed URL detection in the settings.
- Privacy Focused: Works entirely locally on your machine with no data collection.
longDescription.description: The detailed description shown on the web store page
